name: celebrate
trans: vt. 庆祝；举行；赞美；祝贺；宣告 vi. 庆祝；过节；举行宗教仪式

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

name: creative
trans: adj. 创造性的

sentences.english: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.english: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.english: the creative process of writing a poem
sentences.chinese: 写诗的创作过程

sentences.english: Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.english: a creative solution to the problem
sentences.chinese: 这一问题的创新性解决方法

detailed_translations.english: involving the use of imagination to produce new ideas or things

name: crowd
trans: n. 人群；观众；（非正式）一伙人；众多 v. （一批人）（使）挤满；逼近（某人）；聚集；（想法或观点）塞满脑子；催促（因而使人生气或不快）

sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

name: project
trans: n. （生产或研究）工程；方案；计划；事业；项目；专题研究；住房，廉租住宅区 v. 设计；计划；抛射；投射；表现；促进（观点或意象）；确立（好印象）；突出；预测；发送；（声音）扩及远处；想象（自己或场景）在另一个时间或地点；作……投影线；（情感、愿望）无意投射转移（给别人）

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

name: special
trans: adj. 特别的；重要的；特设的；专用的，特有的；特派的；格外的；（主题）研究深入的；特殊（教育）的；特殊（矩阵）的 n. 特别的东西（活动、节目等）；特价（品）；特供菜；特派员；特产；专车 n. (Special) （印、美、俄）史派西娅乐（人名）

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

name: tiny
trans: adj. 微小的；很少的 n. (Tiny)人名；(葡、印)蒂尼

sentences.chinese: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.english: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.chinese: 耳环很小。

sentences.english: a tiny little baby
sentences.chinese: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.chinese: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.chinese: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.english: tiny pieces of paper
sentences.chinese: 碎纸屑片

detailed_translations.english: extremely small

name: coast
trans: n. 海岸；滑行 v. 滑行；（交通工具）快速平稳地移动；得过且过，做事不费力；沿岸航行 v. (Coast) （英、美）科斯特（人名）

sentences.chinese: 他踩下离合器，滑行了一会儿便停下来了。

detailed_translations.english: if a car or bicycle coasts, it moves without any effort from you or any power from the engine
the area where the land meets the sea

name: donate
trans: vt. 捐赠；捐献 vi. 捐赠；捐献

sentences.english: people who volunteer to donate blood
sentences.chinese: 自愿献血者

detailed_translations.english: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them

name: mammal
trans: n. [脊椎] 哺乳动物

sentences.english: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

name: national park
trans: （美）国家公园

name: tide
trans: n. 趋势，潮流；潮汐 vt. 随潮漂流

sentences.chinese: 现在是退潮还是涨潮？

sentences.chinese: 我们去散步，结果被潮水困住了。

detailed_translations.english: the regular rising and falling of the level of the sea

name: burglar
trans: n. 夜贼，窃贼

sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

name: dangerous
trans: adj. 危险的 危险地

sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

name: entertain
trans: vt. 娱乐；招待；怀抱；容纳 vi. 款待

sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?

sentences.chinese: 一个孤单的老人

sentences.chinese: 你整天独自一人不感到寂寞吗？

detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you are alone or do not have anyone to talk to

name: pounce
trans: vi. 突袭，猛扑 vt. 扑过去抓住 n. 猛扑，爪

sentences.chinese: 猫躲在灌木丛中，准备扑上去。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly move forward and attack someone or something, after waiting to attack them
the act of pouncing; a spring or swoop

name: vase
trans: n. 瓶；花瓶 n. （Vase）（塞、罗、芬）瓦塞（人名）

sentences.chinese: …一个插着红玫瑰的花瓶。

detailed_translations.english: a container used to put flowers in or for decoration

name: beach
trans: n. 海滩；湖滨 vt. 将…拖上岸 vi. 搁浅；定居 n. (Beach)人名；(英)比奇

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: gem
trans: n. 宝石，珍宝； 精华；受人重视者 vi. 点缀； 用宝石装饰； 饰以宝石 adj. 最佳品质的 n. (Gem)人名；(英)杰姆

sentences.english: precious gems
sentences.chinese: 珍贵的宝石

detailed_translations.chinese: 宝石，珍宝； 精华；受人重视者

detailed_translations.chinese: 点缀； 用宝石装饰； 饰以宝石

name: grain
trans: n. 粮食；颗粒；[作物] 谷物；纹理 vi. 成谷粒 vt. 使成谷粒 n. (Grain)人名；(法)格兰

sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量

name: rare
trans: adj. 稀有的；稀薄的；半熟的 adj. 杰出的；极度的；非常好的 adv. 非常；极其 vi. 用后腿站起；渴望

sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

trans: n. 海滨；沿海国家（或地区）；支柱；涨潮线与落潮线之间的地带 v. 用支柱撑住；支撑，使稳住；帮助，支持 n. (Shore) （美、英、加）肖尔 （人名）

sentences.chinese: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.english: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.chinese: 她开始朝岸边游去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住

trans: n. 桥；桥牌；桥接器；船桥 vt. 架桥；渡过 n. (Bridge)人名；(英)布里奇

sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.chinese: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

sentences.chinese: 高温和香槟酒使他感到眩晕。

sentences.chinese: 她开始感到一阵阵的眩晕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晕眩的；使人头晕的；昏乱的；心不在焉的；愚蠢的

detailed_translations.chinese: 使头晕眼花；使混乱；使茫然

sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals

name: spray
trans: n. 喷雾，喷雾剂；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 n. (Spray)人名；(英)斯普雷

sentences.english: spray from the waves
sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.english: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

detailed_translations.english: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road

name: upset
trans: vt. 使心烦；颠覆；扰乱 vi. 翻倒 adj. 心烦的；混乱的；弄翻的 n. 混乱；翻倒；颠覆

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

name: armadillo
trans: n. [脊椎] 犰狳

name: foolish
trans: adj. 愚蠢的；傻的

sentences.english: I’ve never heard anything so foolish in all my life.
sentences.chinese: 我这辈子从没听到过这么愚蠢的话。

sentences.english: It would be foolish to ignore his advice.
sentences.chinese: 不听他的劝告才傻呢。

detailed_translations.english: a foolish action, remark etc is stupid and shows that someone is not thinking sensibly

name: forest
trans: n. 森林，林区；（森林似的）一丛；皇家林地，御猎场 v. 植林于；被森林覆盖 n. (Forest) 福雷斯特（人名）

sentences.english: a tropical forest
sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.english: the danger of forest fires
sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is covered with trees

name: hail
trans: n. 冰雹；致敬；招呼；一阵 vt. 致敬；招呼；向...欢呼；猛发；使像下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails） vi. 招呼；下雹 int. 万岁；欢迎 n. (Hail)人名；(阿拉伯、捷)海尔

sentences.english: heavy showers of rain and hail
sentences.chinese: 夹着冰雹的阵阵大雨

detailed_translations.english: frozen raindrops which fall as hard balls of ice

detailed_translations.chinese: 致敬；招呼；向欢呼；猛发；使像下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails）

name: sharp
trans: adj. 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的 adv. 急剧地；锐利地；突然地 n. 尖头 vt. 磨快；把音调升高 vi. 升音演奏 n. (Sharp)人名；(英)夏普

sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily

name: shell
trans: n. 壳，贝壳；炮弹；外形 vi. 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置 vt. 剥皮；炮轰

sentences.english: We ran for cover as shells dropped all around us.
sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

detailed_translations.english: a metal container, like a large bullet, which is full of an explosive substance and is fired from a large gun

detailed_translations.chinese: 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置
detailed_translations.english: to remove something such as beans or nuts from a shell or  pod

name: blanket
trans: n. 毛毯，毯子；毯状物，覆盖层 adj. 总括的，全体的；没有限制的 vt. 覆盖，掩盖；用毯覆盖

sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: diaper
trans: n. 尿布 vt. 给孩子换尿布 n. (Diaper)人名；(英)迪亚珀

sentences.english: I changed her diaper .
sentences.chinese: 我给她换了尿布。

sentences.english: People have been flocking to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 看展览的人络绎不绝。

detailed_translations.english: to go or gather together somewhere in large numbers

name: mate
trans: n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 n. (Mate)人名；(日)蛏(姓)；(西、意、塞)马特；(波黑)马特；(罗、俄)马泰

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: migrate
trans: vi. 移动；随季节而移居；移往 vt. 使移居；使移植

sentences.english: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.english: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

detailed_translations.english: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

name: predator
trans: n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者

sentences.english: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that kills and eats other animals

name: shelter
trans: n. 庇护；避难所；遮盖物 vt. 保护；使掩蔽 vi. 躲避，避难 n. (Shelter)人名；(英)谢尔特

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: burrow
trans: v. 挖地洞，挖通道；依偎；挖穿；钻入；（使）……钻到……下面；（在……里）搜寻；深入查询 n. （动物的，尤指兔子挖的）洞穴，地洞 n. (Burrow) （美）伯罗（人名）

sentences.english: Normally timid, they rarely stray far from their burrows.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常很胆小，极少远离自己的洞穴。

sentences.english: The larvae burrow into cracks in the floor.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫钻进地板的裂缝中。

detailed_translations.english: a passage in the ground made by an animal such as a rabbit or  fox  as a place to live
If an animal burrows into the ground or into a surface, it moves through it by making a tunnel or hole

name: hibernate
trans: vi. 过冬；（动物）冬眠；（人等）避寒

sentences.english: Dormice hibernate from October to May.
sentences.chinese: 睡鼠从10月到5月冬眠。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过冬；（动物）冬眠；（人等）避寒
detailed_translations.english: if an animal hibernates, it sleeps for the whole winter

name: sound
trans: n. 声音；噪音；音响；海峡；听力范围；医用探子；无线电广播；音响效果 v. （使）发声；听起来；鸣警报；听（诊）；回响；探测；试探；宣告；（医）用探子检查；（尤指鲸鱼）潜入深海 adj. 合理的；无损的；有能力的；充足的；彻底的；熟睡的；资金充实的；（非正式）非常棒的；严厉的；健全的 adv. 彻底地，酣畅地

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

name: horrible
trans: adj. 可怕的；极讨厌的

sentences.english: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.chinese: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.english: a horrible smell
sentences.chinese: 极难闻的气味

sentences.english: The food looked horrible, but it tasted OK.
sentences.chinese: 那食物看上去很糟，可吃起来还不错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人恐惧的， 可怕的； 骇人听闻的； 极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的； 糟透的
detailed_translations.english: very bad - used, for example, about things you see, taste, or smell, or about the weather

name: moan
trans: vi. 抱怨，悲叹；呻吟 n. 呻吟声；悲叹 vt. 抱怨；呻吟着说 n. (Moan)人名；(法)莫昂

sentences.english: ‘I feel seasick already,’ she moaned.
sentences.chinese: “我已经开始晕船了。”她抱怨道。

sentences.english: He moaned and groaned all the way there.
sentences.chinese: 他去的一路上抱怨个没完。

sentences.english: Tony moaned in his sleep and then turned over on his side.
sentences.chinese: 托尼在睡梦中呻吟了一下，然后转身侧躺。

detailed_translations.english: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 呻吟声， 呜咽声 A
detailed_translations.english: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure
If you moan, you make a low sound, usually because you are unhappy or in pain

name: pull
trans: vt. 拉；拔；拖 vi. 拉，拖；拔 n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖 n. (Pull)人名；(法)皮尔；(德、瑞典)普尔

sentences.english: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.chinese: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.english: He gave her a sharp pull forward.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

detailed_translations.english: to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
an act of using force to move something towards you or in the same direction that you are moving

name: terrible
trans: adj. 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的 adv. 很，非常

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

name: vine
trans: n. 藤；葡萄树；藤本植物；攀缘植物 vi. 长成藤蔓；爬藤 n. (Vine)人名；(葡)维内；(英)瓦因

sentences.english: Every square metre of soil was used, mainly for olives, vines, and almonds.
sentences.chinese: 每一平方米的土壤都用上了，主要是种植橄榄、葡萄藤和杏树。

detailed_translations.chinese: 藤；葡萄树；藤本植物；攀缘植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that produces grapes

name: control
trans: n. 控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置 vt. 控制；管理；抑制

sentences.english: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

name: exciting
trans: adj. 令人兴奋的；使人激动的 v. 激动；刺激（excite的ing形式）；唤起

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

name: goal
trans: n. 目标；球门，得分数；终点 vi. 攻门，射门得分

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

name: puck
trans: n. 冰球（由硬橡胶制成）；顽皮的小妖精；（英）鼠状定位器；欧夜莺；脾脱疽 n. (Puck)人名；(德)普克

name: level
trans: n. 水平；标准；水平面 adj. 水平的；平坦的；同高的 vi. 瞄准；拉平；变得平坦 vt. 使同等；对准；弄平 n. (Level)人名；(法)勒韦尔

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object
flat and not sloping in any direction

name: overlap
trans: v. 与……重叠，与……互搭；（职责等）部分地重叠，部分地相同；在时间上部分地重叠，同时发生 n. 重叠的部分，互搭量；共同的兴趣（或责任等）；（两事发生的）重叠时间，交接时期

sentences.english: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.chinese: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

sentences.english: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.chinese: 把薄片小心地叠放在一起，那样就没有间隙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分重叠； 部分相同
detailed_translations.english: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.
the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap

name: slanted
trans: adj. 斜的；有倾向的 v. 使倾斜（slant 的过去式和过去分词）

name: third
trans: num. 第三；三分之一；（机动车变速器的）第三挡；（音乐）三度音 n. 三分之一；三等学位（英国大学中低于平均水平的学位） adv. 第三的；三分之一的 adv. 第三（点）

sentences.english: Divide it into thirds.
sentences.chinese: 把它分成三等份。

detailed_translations.english: one of three equal parts of something
coming after two other things in a series

name: width
trans: n. 宽度；广度

sentences.english: a covered terrace extending the full width of the house
sentences.chinese: 和房子同宽的有顶露台

detailed_translations.english: the distance from one side of something to the other

name: blend
trans: vt. 混合 vi. 混合；协调 n. 混合；掺合物

sentences.english: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
sentences.chinese: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.english: a blend of tea
sentences.chinese: 混合茶叶

detailed_translations.english: to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
a mixture of different types of the same thing

name: frame
trans: n. 框架；结构；眼镜框；[电影] 画面 vt. 给 (图画或照片) 配框；设计；建造；陷害；使…适合；制订；拟订 vi. 有成功希望 adj. 有木架的；有构架的 n. (Frame)人名；(英)弗雷姆

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

name: mill
trans: n. 磨坊，磨粉厂；工厂，制造厂；磨粉机；碾磨机；机器，铣床；（非正式）引擎；（非正式，旧）拳击比赛；密尔（北美货币单位，等于0.001美元）；（口语）一百万 v. 碾磨，磨细；切割（金属），铣；轧出（硬币的）边纹；（人或动物）乱转；（使羊毛等）缩绒 n. (Mill) 米尔（人名）

sentences.english: All our flours are milled using traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有的面粉全是用传统方法碾磨的。

sentences.english: Add some freshly milled black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加一些现磨的黑胡椒粉。

detailed_translations.english: to crush grain, pepper etc in a mill

detailed_translations.chinese: 磨坊；碾磨机；制造厂，工厂
detailed_translations.english: a building containing a large machine for crushing grain into flour

name: paper
trans: n. 纸；论文；文件；报纸 adj. 纸做的 vt. 用纸糊；用纸包装 vi. 贴糊墙纸；发交通违章传票 n. (Paper)人名；(俄)帕佩尔

sentences.english: I’ll get you a piece of paper so you can write the number down.
sentences.chinese: 我给你找张纸，你好把号码写下来。

sentences.english: Do you have a pen and paper?
sentences.chinese: 你有笔和纸吗？

sentences.english: the 1998 White Paper on political reform
sentences.chinese: 1998年政治改革白皮书

sentences.english: a paper on the Civil War
sentences.chinese: 一篇关于南北战争的论文

detailed_translations.english: material in the form of thin sheets that is used for writing on, wrapping things etc

name: pulp
trans: n. 纸浆；果肉；黏浆状物质 vt. 使…化成纸浆；除去…的果肉 vi. 变成纸浆；成为浆状

sentences.english: Mash the bananas to a pulp .
sentences.chinese: 把香蕉捣成糊状。

sentences.english: timber grown for wood pulp
sentences.chinese: 种植以制造纸浆的树木

sentences.english: a soft pulp of leaves and mud
sentences.chinese: 树叶和泥巴混成的浆液

detailed_translations.english: a very soft substance that is almost liquid, made by crushing plants, wood, vegetables etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…化成纸浆；除去…的果肉
detailed_translations.english: to beat or crush something until it becomes very soft and almost liquid

name: supply
trans: n. 供给，补给；供应品 vt. 供给，提供；补充 vi. 供给；替代

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

name: backbone
trans: n. 脊骨，脊柱；支柱；骨气，毅力；书脊；（生化）聚合分子主链；（计算机）主干网

sentences.english: Farmers are the backbone of this community.
sentences.chinese: 农场主是这个团体的中坚力量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支柱；主干网；决心，毅力；脊椎
detailed_translations.english: the row of connected bones that go down the middle of your back

name: eel
trans: n. 鳗鱼；鳝鱼

sentences.english: ...smoked eel.
sentences.chinese: …熏鳗。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin fish that looks like a snake and can be eaten

name: fin
trans: n. 鳍；鱼翅；鳍状物 vt. 切除鳍；装上翅 vi. 猛挥鳍；潜泳 n. (Fin)人名；(法)芬

sentences.english: As a fossil hunter, Shubin distinguished himself by leading an expedition to the Arctic in 2004 which uncovered the remains of a fish with a wrist, a creature with part fin, part limb.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名化石搜寻者，舒宾的杰出成就是在2004年带领了一次北极探险。 在这次探险中，他们发现了一种半鳍半肢的动物——一条有腕的鱼化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of the thin body parts that a fish uses to swim

name: gills
trans: n. 鱼鳃（gill的复数）；菌褶；[解剖] 腮下肉；吉耳 v. 除去鱼的鳃和内脏；用刺网捕（gill的三单形式）

name: ray
trans: n. 射线；光线；【鱼类】鳐形目(Rajiformes)鱼 vt. 放射；显出 vi. 放射光线；浮现

sentences.english: The room darkened as a cloud hid the sun’s rays.
sentences.chinese: 一朵云挡住了阳光，房间暗了下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射线；光线；【鱼类】鳐形目(Rajiformes)鱼
detailed_translations.english: a straight narrow beam of light from the sun or moon

name: seahorse
trans: n. 海马

name: church
trans: n. 教堂；礼拜；教派 adj. 教会的；礼拜的 vt. 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式 n. (Church)人名；(英)丘奇

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: mosque
trans: n. 清真寺

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: palace
trans: n. 宫殿；宅邸；豪华住宅

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫

detailed_translations.english: the official home of a person of very high rank, especially a king or queen – often used in names

name: square
trans: adj. 平方的；正方形的；直角的；正直的 vt. 使成方形；与…一致 vi. 一致；成方形 n. 平方；广场；正方形 adv. 成直角地

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: tower
trans: n. 塔；高楼；堡垒 vi. 高耸；超越 n. (Tower)人名；(英)托尔

sentences.english: the Eiffel Tower
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔

sentences.english: a castle with tall towers
sentences.chinese: 有高高的塔楼的城堡

sentences.english: He towered over his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他比他的母亲高出很多。

detailed_translations.english: a tall narrow building either built on its own or forming part of a castle, church etc
to be much taller than the people or things around you

name: Africa
trans: n. 非洲

sentences.english: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

name: behave
trans: vi. 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用 vt. 使守规矩；使表现得…

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc

sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.

sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

name: cold
trans: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的 n. 寒冷；感冒 adv. 完全地

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

name: crash
trans: v. 碰撞；（使）坠毁；（使）摔碎；使发出巨响；（金融企业等）破产；（机器、系统等）崩溃；（比赛中）惨败；（在临时安排的地方）入睡；心脏停止跳动；擅自闯入 n. （交通工具）坠毁；碰撞声；暴跌；（机器、系统的）崩溃；睡觉；粗棉布 adj. 应急的，速成的 adv. 哗啦一声地

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

name: gray
trans: adj. 灰色的；苍白的；灰白头发的；阴郁的 n. 灰色；暗淡的光线 vi. 成为灰色或灰白 vt. 使成灰色或灰白 n. (Gray)人名；(意)格拉伊；(英、法、葡、瑞典)格雷

sentences.english: I like that little gray one. The kids like that one too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢那只灰色的小鸭子， 孩子们也喜欢那只。

sentences.english: Once again he found himself inside the apartment in the enormous gray house.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次发现自己在那所庞大的灰色的房子的房间里了。

sentences.english: If I live in the Pacific Ocean, I can be gray with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 如果我生活在太平洋，我的颜色很可能是带有黑点的灰色。

name: skis
trans: n. 滑雪板（ski的复数） v. 滑雪；给…装上滑橇（ski的第三人称单数）

name: sky
trans: n. 天空；顶点 vt. 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高 vi. 踢或击高空球；把桨叶翘得过高；飞涨 n. (Sky)人名；(英)斯凯

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

name: snowflake
trans: n. 雪花；雪片莲；独特、特别的人（非正式）；过分敏感的人（非正式）

sentences.english: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.chinese: 礼物，雪花，满天星斗的天空，在月光下的所有给你。

sentences.english: Bell is my greetings, singing is my blessing, snowflake is my card, wine is my kiss, the breeze is I embrace, happiness is my gift!
sentences.chinese: 钟声是我的问候，歌声是我的祝福，雪花是我的贺卡，美酒是我的飞吻，清风是我的拥抱，快乐是我的礼物！

sentences.english: Moonlight Christmas and snowflake bless my speech as you, I give you with blessings, are you happy?
sentences.chinese: 圣诞的月光和雪花都不如你祝福我的话语，我把同的祝福给你，你快乐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small soft flat piece of frozen water that falls as snow

name: catch
trans: vt. 赶上；抓住；感染；了解 vi. 赶上；抓住 n. 捕捉；捕获物；窗钩

sentences.english: Did you catch any fish?
sentences.chinese: 你捕到鱼了吗？

sentences.english: Early settlers caught rabbits and squirrels and even rats in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 早期移民为了生存而捕食野兔、松鼠，甚至老鼠。

sentences.english: I caught the 7.15 train to London.
sentences.chinese: 我赶上了7点15分的火车去伦敦。

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn't quite catch what you said.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我没听清楚你的话。

detailed_translations.english: to trap an animal or fish by using a trap, net, or hook, or by hunting it

name: dribble
trans: v. 流（口水），垂（涎）；滴下，细流；运球 n. 点滴，细流；口水；运球；蠢话，馊主意

sentences.english: He was trying to dribble the ball past his opponents.
sentences.chinese: 他想带球晃过对方球员。

detailed_translations.english: to move the ball along with you by short kicks,  bounce s  , or hits in a game of football,  basketball  etc
the act of moving the ball along with you by short kicks,  bounce s  or hits in a game of football,  basketball  etc

name: kick
trans: v. 踢，踢腿；对（自己）生气；（体育中）踢球得分；反冲，朝后座；（非正式）成功戒掉（习惯） n. 踢；（一次）踢球（动作）；有特定踢球能力的运动员；反冲，后座力；猛烈震动；（台球）球的不规则运动；（非正式）极度刺激；（毒品或酒精的）效力；（古）玻璃瓶底的凹底 n. (Kick) （美、德、英）基克（人名）

sentences.english: He kicked the door hard.
sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.english: The boys were kicking a ball around in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在院子里踢球。

sentences.english: She gave him a kick on the shin.
sentences.chinese: 她朝他的小腿踢了一脚。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth with your foot
a movement with the foot or the leg, usually to hit sth with the foot

name: pass
trans: v. 通过，经过；沿某方向前进；使达到（某位置）；传递；传球；遗留给；超过；变化；推移；度过；终止；及格；经表决通过（法律等）；允许；宣布；过；排泄；流通；放弃 n. 及格；经过；通行证；道路，山口；传球；飞跃；阶段；鱼道；（桥牌）不叫；（击剑中的）戳刺；变戏法；（计算机）一次浏览 n. (Pass) （德、英）帕斯（人名）

sentences.english: The crowd parted to let the truck pass.
sentences.chinese: 人群分开让卡车通过。

sentences.english: He gave me a smile as he passed.
sentences.chinese: 他经过时对我微笑了一下。

sentences.english: We passed a group of students outside the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我们在戏院外从一群学生身旁经过。

sentences.english: I pass the sports centre on the way to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班的路上经过体育中心。

sentences.english: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.english: We passed the winter pleasantly enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们相当愉快地度过了那个冬季。

detailed_translations.english: to come up to a particular place, person, or object and go past them

name: soccer
trans: n. 英式足球，足球

sentences.english: I never play soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.english: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.chinese: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.english: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.chinese: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal

name: honor
trans: n. 荣誉；信用；头衔 vt. 尊敬（等于honour）；给…以荣誉

sentences.english: For the French team, winning tomorrow’s game is a matter of national honor.
sentences.chinese: 对法国队来说，打赢明天的比赛事关国家荣誉。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

name: monument
trans: n. 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品 vt. 为…树碑

sentences.english: He erected a monument on the spot where his daughter was killed.
sentences.chinese: 他在女儿遇难的地方立了块纪念碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品
detailed_translations.english: a building,  statue  , or other large structure that is built to remind people of an important event or famous person

name: brain
trans: n. 头脑，智力；脑袋 vt. 猛击…的头部 n. (Brain)人名；(英)布雷恩

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

name: message
trans: n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词 vi. 报信，报告；[通信] 报文 vt. 通知

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

name: nerves
trans: n. [解剖] 神经；神经紧张；胆量（nerve的复数） v. 使振作；鼓足勇气（nerve的第三人称单数）

name: skull
trans: n. 头盖骨，脑壳

sentences.english: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

name: lungs
trans: n. [解剖] 肺（lung的复数形式）

name: oxygen
trans: n. [化学] 氧气，[化学] 氧

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: sac
trans: n. [生物] 囊；液囊 n. (Sac)人名；(西)萨克

sentences.english: The lungs consist of millions of tiny air sacs.
sentences.chinese: 肺包含数百万个小肺泡。

detailed_translations.english: a part inside a plant or animal that is shaped like a bag and contains liquid or air

name: system
trans: n. 制度，体制；系统；方法

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

name: throat
trans: n. 喉咙；嗓子，嗓音；窄路 vt. 开沟于；用喉音说

sentences.english: The singer complained of a sore throat after Wednesday’s show.
sentences.chinese: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

detailed_translations.english: the passage from the back of your mouth to the top of the tubes that go down to your lungs and stomach

name: cardiac
trans: adj. 心脏的，心脏病的；（与）贲门（有关）的 n. （非正式）心脏病患者；强心剂

sentences.english: cardiac surgery
sentences.chinese: 心脏手术

detailed_translations.chinese: 心脏的；心脏病的；贲门的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the heart

name: connected
trans: adj. [计] 连接的；有联系的；连贯的 v. 连接（connect的过去式）

name: muscle
trans: n. 肌肉；力量 vt. 加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出 vi. 使劲行进

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: pump
trans: n. 泵；泵送；无带浅帮女鞋；平底轻便鞋 v. 抽吸；喷出；注入；射向目标；打气；（非正式）盘问；剧烈上下晃动；让……使用大量药物；洗胃；增加数值 n. (Pump) （美、俄、印、泰、加）蓬普（人名）

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: skeletal
trans: adj. 骨骼的，像骨骼的；骸骨的；骨瘦如柴的

sentences.english: Police discovered the skeletal remains of a corpse buried near the river.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了埋在河边的一具尸骨。

detailed_translations.english: like a skeleton or relating to a skeleton

name: organ
trans: n. 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音；阴茎 n. （Organ）人名；（英）奥根

sentences.english: the liver, heart, and other internal organs
sentences.chinese: 肝脏、心脏及其他内脏器官

sentences.english: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.chinese: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.english: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.chinese: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.english: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.english: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.chinese: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

detailed_translations.english: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose

name: pigment
trans: n. [物][生化] 色素；颜料 vt. 给…着色 vi. 呈现颜色

sentences.english: Melanin is the dark brown pigment of the hair, skin and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素是头发、皮肤以及眼睛中的深棕色色素。

sentences.english: The artist Sandy Lee uses natural pigments in her work.
sentences.chinese: 画家桑迪·李在她的作品中使用天然颜料。

detailed_translations.english: a natural substance that makes skin, hair, plants etc a particular colour

name: skin
trans: n. 皮肤；外皮 vt. 剥皮 vi. 愈合；长皮

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: temperature
trans: n. 温度；体温；气温；发烧

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

name: saliva
trans: n. 唾液；涎 n. (Saliva)人名；(俄)萨利瓦

sentences.english: He noticed a lot of saliva settling in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到有很多唾液滞留在他的嘴里。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that is produced naturally in your mouth

name: smell
trans: n. 气味，嗅觉；臭味 v. 嗅，闻；有……气味；察觉到；发出……的气味 n. (Smell) （美、俄、英、印、新）史默乐（人名）

sentences.english: I can smell burning.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到烧焦的气味。

sentences.english: Can you smell something?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到什么气味了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to notice or recognize a particular smell
the quality that people and animals recognize by using their nose

name: stomach
trans: n. 胃；腹部；胃口 vt. 忍受；吃下 vi. 忍受

sentences.english: I was so hungry my stomach hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我饿得胃都痛了。

sentences.english: His stomach was full of food.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃里塞满了食物。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your body where food begins to be  digested
to be able to accept something, especially something unpleasant

name: darkness
trans: n. 黑暗；模糊；无知；阴郁

sentences.english: the long hours of darkness during winter
sentences.chinese: 冬季漫长的黑夜

sentences.english: We lit our campfire as darkness fell (= it became night ) .
sentences.chinese: 夜幕降临，我们点起了篝火。

sentences.english: He stared out the window at the gathering darkness (= the night slowly coming ) .
sentences.chinese: 他凝视着窗外渐浓的夜色。

detailed_translations.english: when there is no light

name: hearing
trans: n. 听力；审讯，听讯 v. 听见（hear的ing形式） n. (Hearing)人名；(英)希尔林

sentences.english: a child with a hearing disability
sentences.chinese: 有听力障碍的儿童

detailed_translations.english: the sense which you use to hear sounds

name: survive
trans: vt. 幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长 vi. 幸存；活下来

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.chinese: 活下来，继续存在；幸免于
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

detailed_translations.chinese: 从中挺过来； 从…逃出； 比…活得长
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live normally in spite of many problems

name: customer
trans: n. 顾客；家伙

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

name: freeway
trans: n. 高速公路

detailed_translations.english: a small European bird with a red breast and brown back

name: arrest
trans: v. 逮捕；（司法机关）扣留（船只）；阻止；吸引；心跳停止，心脏病发作； n. 逮捕，监禁； 停止，中止 n. (Arrest) （法）阿雷斯特（人名）

sentences.english: He was arrested and charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控谋杀。

sentences.english: I got arrested for careless driving.
sentences.chinese: 我因鲁莽驾驶被捕。

sentences.english: drugs used to arrest the spread of the disease
sentences.chinese: 用于控制疾病蔓延的药物

detailed_translations.english: if the police arrest someone, the person is taken to a  police station  because the police think they have done something illegal

name: dawn
trans: n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 n. (Dawn)人名；(西)道恩

sentences.english: When dawn broke (= the first light of the day appeared ) , we were still 50 miles from Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 破晓的时候，我们离加尔各答还有50英里。

sentences.english: I was up at the crack of dawn (= very early in the morning ) to get the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我一大早就起来赶飞机。

sentences.english: We worked from dawn to dusk (= through the whole day while it is light ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们从早干到晚。

sentences.english: the cold light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 清冷的晨曦

sentences.english: The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，破晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: the time at the beginning of the day when light first appears
if day or morning dawns, it begins

name: nettle
trans: n. 荨麻，荨麻科 v. 惹怒，使恼火；用荨麻刺伤或鞭打（某人）

sentences.english: The nettles stung their legs.
sentences.chinese: 荨麻刺痛了他们的腿。

detailed_translations.english: a wild plant with rough leaves that sting you

name: spell
trans: v. 拼写；拼缀出（单词）；拼成；意味着；替换，顶替；稍事休息；具有……的显著特征；导致 n. 符咒；着魔；一段时间；魅力，魔力；休息期；一轮投球时间；木片 n. (Spell) （美）斯佩尔（人名）

sentences.english: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.chinese: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.english: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.chinese: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
detailed_translations.english: to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it

name: task
trans: n. （困难的）任务，工作；（语言教学中的）活动 v. 派给某人（任务）；对（手段或能力）要求极高

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

name: wicked
trans: adj. 邪恶的；恶劣的；不道德的；顽皮的

sentences.english: the wicked stepmother in ‘Hansel and Gretel’
sentences.chinese: 《糖果屋》中那个恶毒的继母

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is morally wrong

name: actor
trans: n. 男演员；行动者；作用物

sentences.english: His father was an actor in the Cantonese Opera Company.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲曾是粤剧团的一名演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who performs in a play or film

name: difficult
trans: adj. 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

name: film
trans: n. 电影；薄膜；胶卷；轻烟 vt. 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影 vi. 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛 vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛 n. 游戏；比赛；剧本 n. (Play)人名；(法、瑞典)普莱

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: popular
trans: adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

name: bored
trans: adj. 无聊的；无趣的；烦人的 v. 使厌烦（bore的过去式）；烦扰

sentences.english: He was easily bored.
sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.english: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

detailed_translations.english: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do

name: microphone
trans: n. 扩音器，麦克风

sentences.english: She spoke confidently into the microphone.
sentences.chinese: 她自信地对着麦克风说话。

sentences.english: They searched the room for hidden microphones.
sentences.chinese: 他们在屋里翻找隐藏的话筒。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you speak into to record your voice or make it louder when you are speaking or performing in public

name: neighborhood
trans: n. 附近；街坊；接近；街区

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

name: squeal
trans: v. 告密；长声尖叫 n. 尖叫声

sentences.english: They drove off, tyres squealing.
sentences.chinese: 他们开车走了，轮胎发出吱的一声。

sentences.english: ‘Let me go!’ she squealed.
sentences.chinese: “让我走！”她尖声叫道。

detailed_translations.english: to make a long loud high sound or cry
a long loud high sound or cry

name: vacation
trans: n. 假期；（房屋）搬出 vi. 休假，度假

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: field
trans: n. 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场;字段 vi. 担任场外队员 adj. 扫描场；田赛的；野生的 vt. 把暴晒于场上；使上场 n. (Field)人名；(英、法、德、葡)菲尔德

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

name: graze
trans: vt. 放牧；擦伤 vi. 吃草；擦伤 n. 放牧；轻擦

sentences.english: fields where they used to graze their sheep
sentences.chinese: 他们过去放羊的田野

detailed_translations.english: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin

name: pin
trans: n. 大头针，别针，针；栓；琐碎物 vt. 钉住；压住；将……用针别住

sentences.english: a diamond pin
sentences.chinese: 一枚钻石胸针

sentences.english: He pinned the name tag on his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他把姓名牌别在自己的短外套上。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal, sometimes containing jewels, that you fasten to your clothes to wear as a decoration
to fasten something somewhere, or to join two things together, using a pin

name: sheepdog
trans: n. 牧羊犬

name: wool
trans: n. 羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物 n. (Wool)人名；(英)伍尔

sentences.english: a wool overcoat
sentences.chinese: 羊毛大衣

sentences.english: a ball of wool
sentences.chinese: 一团毛线

detailed_translations.english: the soft thick hair that sheep and some goats have on their body
